posts.post_content:
I think the rating is a bit low, although i admit that it won't help you much if your opponent has any creatures.  
(Also there are better one-drop goblins with an attack power of 2, like [Tattermunge Maniac](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tattermunge Maniac), [Goblin Guide](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Goblin Guide) or even [Mogg Cons.cripts](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=4831)/[Goblin Cohort](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Goblin Cohort))  
  
But this provides some fun with [Sheltering Ancient](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sheltering Ancient).  
...downside is that it requires your opponent to attack or block with a creature.
posts.html:
I think the rating is a bit low, although i admit that it won't help you much if your opponent has any creatures.
(Also there are better one-drop goblins with an attack power of 2, like Tattermunge Maniac, Goblin Guide or even Mogg Cons.cripts/Goblin Cohort)

But this provides some fun with Sheltering Ancient.
...downside is that it requires your opponent to attack or block with a creature.
